title: Tom Hardy returning to CBeebies Bedtime Story for Valentine's Day - with a DOG!
text:

The bosses at CBeebies have clearly been thinking of the mums this Valentine’s Day. 
After the success of his New Year’s Eve Bedtime Story, Tom Hardy has been invited back to tuck us all in again. 
CBeebies announced the amazing news on their Facebook page with a teaser clip of the Taboo star and a dog, adding: “You’re not doing anything Tuesday night, right?” 
In the clip, Tom is sitting on a balcony wearing a red coat, and he says: “Cloud spotting is definitely more enjoyable, especially if your best friend is a dog. Read More Tom Hardy is returning to Bedtime Story (Photo: CBeebies) What a lovely Valentine's Day present! (Photo: CBeebies) He has a dog too! (Photo: CBeebies) 
“And I’ve spotted you’re not in bed yet. Get yourself tucked up and I’ll see you very soon for another Bedtime Story. 
“Night night!” 
Over 11,000 people have already shared the announcement on the CBeebies Facebook page with seemingly every mum in the country planning on tuning in. 
One excited user commented: "Thank you CBeebies for clearly putting the grown ups first when signing up Mr Hardy for the bedtime stories. I still haven't managed to see his first one but I'm looking forward to this one!" 
While another, referencing the release of Fifty Shades Darker, added: “Well thank you CBeebies, everyone rushing to the cinema to see Mr Grey this week. However from the comfort of my home you give us Mr Hardy, AGAIN !!! We ❤️ you CBeebies x.” Read More What more could we ask for? (Photo: CBeebies) Mums are over the moon (Photo: CBeebies) Just look (Photo: CBeebies) Perfection. (Photo: CBeebies) 
But it seems some dads are feeling a little left out when it comes to bedtime entertainment. 
One dad said: "Nothing against Tom Hardy and his admirers, but are we going to see any posts from CBeebies highlighting the particularly attractive ladies reading the bedtime stories? Didn't think so.” 
But CBeebies is eager to please the dads, commenting: "Not as yet... but the lovely Isla Fisher does read a NEW story this Friday night. See Dads, we think of you too." 
So that's Valentine's Day sorted. 
*CBeebies Bedtime Stories is on CBeebies every day at 6.50pm. Like us on Facebook
